---
title: "Street Light Outage Data Comparison"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(rvest)
library(ggthemes)

```


```{r}
#adding and cleaning data (one of them was formatted with commas sonthey were removed with the numeric code)
street_lights <- read.csv("street_lights.csv") %>% 
  clean_names

median_income <- read.csv("median_income*.csv") %>% 
  clean_names

glimpse(median_income)
median_income$x2020_data <- as.numeric(median_income$x2020_data)

#analysis

street_lights10 <- street_lights %>% 
  slice_max(x2020_data, n = 10)

street_lights10 %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x=reorder(x2020_data, community), weight=x2020_data, fill = x2020_data)) +
    labs(title = "Street Light Outages Per 1,000 Residents ", 
       subtitle = "BNIA Data, 2020",
       caption = "Graphic by Parker Leipzig",
       y="Numbers of Street Lights Out",
       x="Community")

median_income10 <- median_income %>% 
  slice_max(x2020_data, n = 10)

median_income10 %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x=reorder(x2020_data, community), weight=x2020_data, fill = x2020_data)) +
    labs(title = "Median Income in Baltimore City Neighborhoods ", 
       subtitle = "BNIA Data, 2020",
       caption = "Graphic by Parker Leipzig",
       y="Median Income in $",
       x="Community")
```
